title: Alright screw it, how do I get caught up on Dragon Ball Super?
body:
With YouTube annoyingly forcing it in my recommended videos and just seeing pop up everywhere I go, I put it off long enough and wanna see what all the hub-bub is about

I gotta watch the two movies Battle of Gods and Resurrection 'F' first, but after that what do I do?

Cuz I heard some of the stuff was just retreads of those movies or was bad in general somehow, so I dunno ether just to go with the movies then watch it all or skip to a certain part then go from there
